name: A Mermaid Adventure - Ocean Paradise
description:
Magical adventure under the sea. Share in the adventure as these mermaids swim by, encountering strange sea creatures while collecting gold and silver coins. Pick and choose from several characters and different worlds. It truly is magic.
How to Play:
Tilt your device left or right to steer the mermaid. Collect coins and power-ups to unlock characters and worlds.
Features:
- Beautiful Graphics
- Cute animation and awesome soundtrack
- Fun game play
- Challenging

Download ‘Mermaid Adventure’ today and have some fun!
